text: A Romantic Adventuress is a 1920 American silent drama movie directed by Harley Knoles and starring Dorothy Dalton, Charles Meredith, Augusta Anderson, Ivo Dawson, Robert Schable. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1920 movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Harley Knoles Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: A Romantic Adventuress
